response.original_title: Relativity - The Family Saga of Star Trek: The Next Generation
response.overview: The challenges in producing Star Trek The Next Generation's fourth season are revealed by cast and crew while also exploring the show's evolution after the critically acclaimed 3rd season turned the show into a crossover hit. This documentary also explores the Family theme for the show's fourth season with behind the scenes details on such key episodes as REUNION and BROTHERS giving fans a look into the personal relationships and family bonds of the crew of the Enterprise.
response.title: Relativity - The Family Saga of Star Trek: The Next Generation
